document_data.name: Majeed
document_data.mainbody: '''Majeed''' was a [[earth genasi]] caravanner and guard leader who lived in the land of [[Turmish]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Both his eyes and the lines that patterned his skin shone a bright gold color.
document_data.Abilities: While working with the caravan master [[Faroz]], Majeed was put in charge of commanding their group's guardsmen.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1486}}, Majeed was present on the caravan journey that saw his company pick up four travelers, each of whom was the [[chosen]] do a different [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian deity]]. He helped lead their defense against [[orc]] raiders, and [[shade]]s of [[Netheril]].
